main event: A UFO sighting was reported in San Diego, California on 11 October 1957, involving a light that alternated from blue-white to orange-red and was observed to be stationary before moving rapidly.
interesting points: The object was described as a light with fluctuating colors., It was stationary for a time before accelerating rapidly., The sighting was recorded at 0232 hours., Interpretations of the event included possible explanations such as a balloon or meteor., Further analysis of photographic data was suggested to gain better understanding.
sighted object: a light alternating from blue-white to orange-red
witness description: The witness observed the object visually and noted its color changes.
